title: WTT/ WTS T206 PRINT FREAK!!! newt randall "caption jump"
author: mrvster

posts.post_title: WTT/ WTS T206 PRINT FREAK!!! newt randall "caption jump"
posts.post_content:
hello all!!

looking to trade this beauty! I have been collecting T206 print freaks for over 20 something years and have only seen 1 other example similar to this type of "print freak"!!!!!!!!!!!!!! (it was a del howard)....

card has a full caption jump, where as the entire name, and designation are fully printed inside the border!!!!!

I have seen examples where the caption is nearly inside the border, but never fully like this card!!!THIS IS A VERY RARE FREAK:)

I have been diversifying my collection a tad, and have always collected rare T206 backs....

willing to trade for a higher end rare T206 back or something similar....or listening to cash offers, or combo's....

I have better scans if you email me also...


[url]jvanderbeck@verizon.net[/url]

the howard I lost to a whale many years ago on ebay....the only other "caption jump" fully I have ever seen!:eek:

trust me,  super rare cards!
JV- super rare card. Good luck.
Wow, that is wild Johnny. Very cool!
while i may be a freak...i'm not a freak collector...but those...are very COOL!!!!!  Good luck with a deal Johny!

so much guys!:)

it is a true rarity most don't even know exist:D

Looks like Newt may be the only T206er with a beard, although Amish style.

Put Randall and Titus together and you'd have a full beard.
I love this card!  If I had enough expendable cash, we'd be talking. Good luck on this beauty...you have one great collection, Johnny!

and the rest......thank you so much! looks like Newt is going to a great home!:D 

thanks so much for everyone's interest and kind offers:)
